org.pepstock.charba.client.options

Class TickMinor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.AbstractTick<Ticks,IsDefaultMinorTick>
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.TickMinor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultBaseTick, IsDefaultFontItem, IsDefaultMinorTick, HasFont

    public final class TickMinor
extends AbstractTick<Ticks,IsDefaultMinorTick>
implements IsDefaultMinorTick
    It defines options for the minor tick marks that are generated by the axis.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
